ai-patthana17.14:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
ai-patthana17.14:1.1_0: Unskillfulness for an unskillful teaching, not skilled in diffusedfulness.
ai-patthana17.14:2.1_0: Skillful teaching arises dependent on the spot.
ai-patthana17.14:3.1_0: An undetermined teaching has not been declared by the Buddha.
